#summary How to get started quickly with QuiXProc

= Introduction =

We assume that you succeed in compiling the source code of *QuiXProc Open*

== Simple sample ==
Suppose that you have the following very simple XPL `add-attribute.xpl`:
{{{
<p:declare-step xmlns:p="http://www.w3.org/ns/xproc" version="1.0">
  <p:identity>
    <p:input port="source">
      <p:inline>
        <root/>
      </p:inline>
    </p:input>
  </p:identity>
  <p:add-attribute match="root" attribute-name="foo" attribute-value="bar"/>
  <p:store href="root-with-attribute.xml"/>
</p:declare-step>
}}}
Then you can launch the example with 
{{{
java innovimax.quixproc.code.drivers.open.QuiXProcB add-attribute.xpl
}}}
or
{{{
java innovimax.quixproc.code.drivers.open.QuiXProcC add-attribute.xpl
}}}
